content.html: I used to think “never meet your heroes” was about people being assholes. And don’t get me wrong, plenty of folks are. But it’s also about unreasonable expectations put on people who don’t know you. We don’t talk about that bit.
content.value:
I used to think “never meet your heroes” was about people being assholes. And don’t get me wrong, plenty of folks are. 

But it’s also about unreasonable expectations put on people who don’t know you. We don’t talk about that bit.
